title: Server downtime for ranked reset
body:
Hello OCE Rioters,

What time does the server go down tonight for the ranked reset?
Just wondering if I should rush home after work or not to grind them 10 games, cheers guys/gals!

replies.body: "On 07/12/16, starting at 04:30 Sydney Time (17:30 UTC), ranked queues will be disabled in preparation for patch 6.24. At 06:00 Sydney Time (19:00 UTC), the servers will be shut down and all games currently in progress will end in a draw and stats will not be recorded. We estimate the battlegrounds will be unavailable for 3 hours." ~ http://status.leagueoflegends.com/?en_AU#oce
